entry.title: Let‚Äôs de-grave marina
entry.content:
I am shocked by Stalin‚Äôs announcement of massive 80 crore waste to decorate Karunadhi‚Äôs grave with a massive statue of a pen on an artificial island. 80 crores is massive money. It could be given to 800 people to start very small business, even if 1% of them succeed, it will be good. But what good does it do decorating a grave?

I truly wonder what gives right to these dravidian parties to put their dead bodies in Marina? It‚Äôs a beach, it belongs to people, more than us, it belongs to all nature. We have converted it into a graveyard and have put artificial structures there.

A leader might be needed for a society (of people who cannot think well, for a society that could think will be leader less), but I wonder what‚Äôs the big thing in having a rotting corpse below a huge concrete structure? It looks childish and silly.

One of the thing that outrages me is that we have mausoleum for a proven criminal Jayalaitha in Marina, and almost none opposes it.

I honestly think a person should be remembered for what he had done. Today I know English and interact with the world, thanks to Annadurai. I am an atheist and think rationally, and don‚Äôt encourage building temples, mosques, churches and mausoleum, thanks to Periyaar. I don‚Äôt remember these people because I saw their graves, but the good things that they have done to me.

I remember Abdul Kalaam not because of his grave, but he protected me from invaders, helped our nation become a space power. I don‚Äôt even know where his grave is, though I do know they have built one for him. I remember Kamaraj for his honesty and, his ability not to build grave for his mom even though he was a powerful chief minister of Tamilnadu. I don‚Äôt know where Kamaraj is burried, I don‚Äôt even know if he was cremated.

The worst thing is that the 80 crores that Stalin wants to spend on decorating his dad‚Äôs grave is our hard-earned money. It‚Äôs not from Red Giant‚Äôs or G-squares or some binaami‚Äôs loot. I really wonder what gives the right for these DMK and ADMK to waste our money on dead bodies like this? May be if they earned honestly they would know worth of money and spend it better.

Maybe we people are powerless, coward, and have too much to lose now by protesting against dravidian rule, but I feel ultimately we must de-grave Marina. All these bodies should be taken out, put somewhere else, beach should be given back to people to walk, turtles to reproduce, crabs to crawl.

I encourage the reader to talk about this loot going on in Tamilnadu. I encourage one to think about the good ways of using money than wasting it on dead matter. I wish you would would remeber this blog when you vote again.

entry.title: 7 Japanese Philosophies
entry.content:
1. OUBAITORI

Never compare yourself.

Everyone blossoms in their own time in different ways. Don‚Äôt judge yourself by someone else‚Äôs path.

2. KAIZEN

Continuously improve.

Constantly strive to improve across all areas of your life. Small changes accumulate and make all the difference.

3. WABI-SABI

Embrace Imperfection.

Nothing lasts, nothing is complete. Accept your own flaws and those of others. Find beauty in imperfection.

4. GAMAN

Have dignity during duress.

Hard times need to b e met with emotional maturity and self-control. We need patience, perseverance, tolerance.

5. IKIGAI

Know your reason for being.

Define the reason you get up in the morning. Make ti something you are good at passionate about, and that the world needs. THIS is meaning.

6. SHIKITA GA NAI

Accept and let go.

Some things simply aren‚Äôt within our control. Accept what you cannot change, and move on.

7. SHU-HA-RI

Learn, Experiment, Innovate.

‚ÄúWhen the student is ready the teacher will appear.

When the student is truly ready‚Ä¶ The teacher will Disappear‚Äù

‚Äì Tao Te Ching

It is a way of thinking about how to learn and master a technique. There are 3 stages to acquiring knowledge:

Shu: Learn the basics by following the teaching of one master. Imitating the work of great masters also falls in this stage.

Ha: Start experimenting, learn from masters, and integrate the learning into the practice.

Ri: This stage focuses on innovation and adapting the learning to different situations.

entry.title: Dall-E generated mascot
entry.content:
Dall-E generated pig mascot.

Designers do cost, sometimes even more than developers. Designing is a very creative process. Certainly web pages designed by me sucks, compared to one done by designer. Sometimes I need to shell out a lot if I am doing my personal open source project.

I wanted to write a Personal Micro Blog application to learn Clojure which I named as pig. I have generated a codeberg project here. I wanted a cute baby pig as mascot. I asked designer and he gave me his budget, it was big. I used Dall-E to generate the mascot. I used an A.I tool to upscale the image, and I used A.I to remove background.

I gave the cute pig mascot to my designer to make it into a sticker which you can see in this blog above. I think I reduced designing cost by 70% this time, and I am very happy.

entry.title: Dogs, bloody dogs
entry.content:
Today I see a guy opposite to my home across the water logged empty ground feeding stray dogs. Frankly I would be very happy if he sees his children die before him and he one day vomits blood and die. He must be dead on the road, the same hungry dogs he fed must feast on his meat.

Monday gone, I had to concentrate on work, but from morning 4AM, a stray dog was barking right outside my home at the top of its voice, I couldn‚Äôt sleep. Thankfully my client is very liberal, so I tried to have breakfast, did some minor work, had some lunch and tried to catch sleep, then my neighbor‚Äôs dogs started to bark. I cursed my neighbor‚Äôs too.

The bloody stray dog disturbed my sleep again on Monday night and even on Tuesday I was unable to do the work. I don‚Äôt know where I missed out due to lack of concentration, but I was thinking Thursday wad Wednesday and I missed out on a meeting. I felt so bad.

I am not against dogs, have them, feed them. But if they drop shit on road pick it up and take it home. Such an eyesore and disease spreading they are. You have to watch the dog shit or concentrate on traffic or pedestrian‚Äôs while traveling? Dog owners and lovers please answer this.

If you love dogs, have them in a sound-proof room where they can bark all the hell out, if you want to be in that room so that you can listen to the music you love that‚Äôs made by your dog, none objects, but letting it disturb your neighbor‚Äôs is barbaric and uncultured.

Do not take dogs walks outside because it has no toilet sense, it shits out, and you won‚Äôt pick that treasure of yours up and take it to your home and lick it, instead you will leave it there. Your dog will urinate on lampposts and dustbins, and you won‚Äôt wash it.

Being such irresponsible human who just cares about you and your dog, what‚Äôs the use of your existence? Why you must have family and kids? If you have why should your kids survive with such a genetic defect you have? Why you shouldn‚Äôt watch your kids die thus feel bit better that the Earth is bit more purified? Why those indiscipline dogs you fed, feed on your carcass when you drop dead vomiting blood on street? Maybe some of those dogs might even urinate on your dead body proving their loyalty to you.

entry.title: Need for Tamil Professional Examination
entry.content:
Yesterday I went to hotel named Balaji Bhavan in Sithalapakkam, none except two were there in the hotel (excluding two customers who were sitting like zombies), some lady was doing some work and at the counter there was this guy. I asked for a kothu parotta parcel and he said ‚Äúkothu parotta‚Äù, the way he said it confirmed he was from north India. I wanted to ask what‚Äôs there in their hotel‚Äôs menu, so I asked it, and he said ‚Äúkothu parotta‚Äù. I asked him what all items / dishes he had, he said ‚Äúkothu parotta‚Äù.

I got fed up and started walking out of the hotel and said cancel it, he said ‚Äúkothu parotta ready‚Äù, I walked out any way wondering how kothu parotta could be ready within two minutes. It‚Äôs annoying with these people now days, though I know Hindi, I am a Tamil and my Hindi did not kick in, these northern people have an illusion that everywhere in India Hindi is spoken, they come here uneducated and irritate us. It‚Äôs great that Tamilnadu is providing work for these people and is contributing to the uplifting of North India, but at the same time our government should ensure these people are educated to serve us.

My plan is this, just like IELTS, we must have Tamil Professional Examination that every worker in Tamilnadu should take. Its syllabus should contain practical Tamil and must train people speak and write fluently. Imagine for example, how good it will be if doctors write medicine names in Tamil and medicine comes with Tamil labels in them? The syllabus should contain basic Tamil grammar and history, so that these workers who should take it by law to work in our land can speak fluently with us and serve us better.

Despite dynastic politics and deep-rooted corruption that erode us, Tamils are hard workers, and we are developing. We are the most urbanized state in India, our economy too is diverse, we have plan to reach 1 trillion $ economy, and it‚Äôs high time we make our work force work smooth with us.

entry.title: Does Coimbatore contain high number of psychopaths?

Just then I was reminded how my life was tormented by people in Coimbatore belt. She knew nothing about I.T and code, but lusted for power, she was like Nandhini in Ponniyin Selvan, I think life hurts her very much, possibly she did not like her marriage. She was highly sociable person, but she behaved like a psycho. I would give my team member a task, only to see that he had been seduced by her to complete her task. I was shocked and called her, and she threatened me to book me in harassing case. I was shocked a bit, but then I gained all my strength, told her to proceed, and I took it as my personal mission to work against her underground and looks like it paid off.

In that same company there was an old jalra guy to the management who was a true psychopath, who enjoyed putting grief into people, and he was this evil woman‚Äôs partner. This evil woman was from Coimbatore, I do suspect this evil guy was also from Coimbatore, but I am not sure.
